Content:: The Asia Pacific Democrat Union (APDU) is an international regional association of member parties, associated to the International Democrat Union.[1] Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickramasinghe is the current chairperson of the Asia Pacific Democrat Union.[2] It aims to promote freedom and free enterprise by considering matters of political organization and policy of interest to member parties.[3] This article about politics is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
